unnormalised: Hey, any updates on Virat's shoulder? Heard he took a nasty fall during the 3rd ODI in Nagpur on 10/10/2024. Hope he's fit for the T20 series. What about Bumrah? Is he still recovering from that back strain since 26/01/2024? Last I heard, it was touch-and-go. Also, anything new on Hardik? Heard he's been doing yoga at the Patanjali Yogpeeth at 07:00 hrs daily to get back in shape. Hope he's ready soon!
normalised: Hey, any updates on Virat's shoulder? Heard he took a nasty fall during the third O D I in Nagpur on tenth October two thousand and twenty four. Hope he's fit for the T twenty series. What about Bumrah? Is he still recovering from that back strain since twenty sixth January two thousand and twenty four? Last I heard, it was touch-and-go. Also, anything new on Hardik? Heard he's been doing yoga at the Patanjali Yogpeeth at seven zero zero hours daily to get back in shape. Hope he's ready soon!
